All Implemented Interfaces:
ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.coap.RequestHandler, java.lang.Comparable<ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.Resource>
public class TasksResource
extends ch.ethz.inf.vs.californium.endpoint.LocalResource

The Class TasksResource implements the task resource. The task resource is used to add new tasks to the persisting service.

Constructor Summary

          Instantiates a new tasks resource and adds it to the resource tree.
